Reviews.Title: “GREAT LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Very good breakfast and great location 70 m near U-Bahn. Very cheap markets and shooping centers near the hotel.Rooms are clean but pillows are not good. They are very thin like a pizza.Staff also can speak turkish and english that was wonderfull. Tegel airport to hotel taxi’s fee is both way only 30 euro for 5 pax.

Reviews.Title: “i would not recommand this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: i had a pillow with old blood stain on it, they put me in smokers floor even though i am not & they did not ask me if i smoke or not, they told me to checkout at 12pm sharp even though i have A-Club gold member ship which allows me for late checkout, & they refuse to give me even 15 minutes after 12PM. internet was not free & very slow 9 euro for 1 hour of bad internet service!

Reviews.Title: “!”
Reviews.Author: TrueStorm
Reviews.Content: So we arrived before the official check in time of 1500hrs and they stored our luggage until about 1400hrs when we got back and they had a room ready. We had reserved a standard room - nothing special but breakfast included, we was very surprised when we got into our room, it was huge, like a suite!! So with minibar, dressing gowns and slippers we was very pleased, together with the spaciousness of the room and the coolness of the air-conditioning too. The air conditioning was so needed as it was very very hot in Berlin at the time of our stay, we have also stayed in other Mercure's in Berlin and they didn't have this facility. We was in Berlin for a clubbing/ festival weekend, so we got in late, got up for breakfast, went back to sleep and got out for around 1400hrs each day. The breakfast was buffet hot and cold, very satisfied! Even though we left our room very late, we came back and it had been spotlessly cleaned too! We would stay again, although the only downside was the surrounding area; a few minutes walk to the underground no problems however the area was very run down. This was a little uncomfortable when walking back at night, in the day too; there are lots of cheap shops/ kebab houses etc. Anyway for a perfectly comfortable stay it does the job fine!

Reviews.Title: “Quite a nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: ReisenistmeinHobby
Reviews.Content: This hotel has a nice lobby and bar area with computer access (free, but there are only two computers, so you may have to wait), comfortable rooms, and an excellent breakfast buffet. The neighborhood is not fancy, but the hotel is 1/2 block from a main shopping street; this is practical. You can get what you need easily. I think my only complaint is the lack of a swimming pool.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel - location...hmm”
Reviews.Author: misharmo
Reviews.Content: The hotel room was spacious, clean and well designed. We overlooked the street but there was no noise. The breakfast was good and the bar prices weren't too bad. The hotel is right besides the underground. The area is a little bit dodgy after dark and I wouldn't walk around alone at night. However, there are some decent restaurants and lots of cheap shops - just take your pepper spray.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, but the "air conditioning" needs help!”
Reviews.Author: Ladyfalkn
Reviews.Content: We stayed one night and had to check out due to the heat. The hotel explained that they have a "ventilation system", not "American air conditioning". They were very gracious about canceling our second night, I just could not sleep in the hot room. The hotel is comfortable, clean and the restaurant is very good.

Reviews.Title: “A class above other Mercure Hotels - Great Value, Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: ticex
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at the Mercure Berlin Tempelhof Airport several times over the past years with the latest visit being for the bargain price of only €65! At this kind of price it has to be one of the best value hotels I've ever stayed in. The rooms are exceptionally clean and in superb condition (mine even had a kitchenette!), the beds are large and very comfortable and the bathroom is spotlessly clean and of a good size. Worth noting if you're arriving with a car is it's free to park on the street 2 minutes walk away but failing that the hotel offers an underground garage for about €10 per night. You know what to expect when staying at a Mercure in Germany but this one is a cut above the others I've stayed at and will always be my first choice when staying in Berlin.

Reviews.Title: “Overall ok, but...”
Reviews.Author: grabtool
Reviews.Content: The overall experience of the hotel was positive. However, I must say that it is absolutely OUTRAGEOUS that a 4-star hotel (not a cheap one, mind you) charges you 17 EURO EXTRA for breakfast. I mean, please.... Even if they served lobster (which I very much doubt they do) I still think it is completely ridiculous. Therefore, although I liked the hotel as such, I will not stay there ever again.

Reviews.Title: “LOVED IT!”
Reviews.Author: michAustralia
Reviews.Content: With 4 months of travelling and staying at MANY hotels, we thought this hotel was outstanding! Lovely staff, great location, AMAZING breakfast buffet ( have never seen anything like it!) and really CLEAN and comfortable room! We used the the restaurant many a night for dinner and it was A+ and the wait staff very helpful. We would totally recommend it and would stay there again should we be lucky enough to travel again in the future!

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: The_Sams
Reviews.Content: Staff was professional but not friendly - seemed robotic when they welcomed me. Website states it has free continental breakfast, wireless and transportation to the airport. It has the breakfast but it didn't come with my room. When I asked about why the wireless wasn't working I was told that it's no longer included in the price. The phones didn't work either. I mentioned that their website still has the wireless listed as an amenity. No response. I asked about the free transportation to the airport and was told that would be no problem. I needed to check out at 3:30 AM to catch my flight. When the cab arrived the driver wanted cash. I told him it was supposed to be free. He insisted it wasn't and was going to drive off. I convinced him to wait while I went back in to check. The staff member at the front desk asked how much he wanted and I told them. They wrote a note in German (which I don't read) and told me to give it to the driver. The driver became upset when he read it - they had promised to give him money later but it was less than what the trip cost. Since the meter had been running he would have been really short. I told him I'd pay the difference as I didn't want to miss by flight. On a positive note, the room was huge if that's important to you.

Reviews.Title: “Ok experience”
Reviews.Author: MissyAl
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 4 nights whilst attending a conference at the Hotel Estrel (10 mins away in a taxi). The rooms were basic but comfortable and very clean. I had room service one morning which was ok, but nothing exciting! Hotel staff were very friendly. Handily there is a taxi rank just outside the hotel on the street. Took us maybe 15-20 mins to get into the centre of Berlin. My favourite bit was that they left me heart shaped sweets on my pillow on valentines night! If I was returning to Berlin, I'd happily stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “An Enjoyable Stay”
Reviews.Author: Cauchemar
Reviews.Content: This hotel made a perfect base for our long weekend in Berlin. Having landed at Tegel airport a bus and a couple of underground trains got us to a few hundred meters from the hotel. The staff were very friendly and helpful when asked for advise. The rooms were very clean and well finished. Noise was not an issue at all with no sound traveling from adjacent rooms or from outside. The breakfasts were first class with a wide selection of dishes to choose from and was open until 11:00. The gym is fairly small but has modem equipment and two separate showers. The sauna gave us a nice relaxing end to the day and was free.

Reviews.Title: “5 star level”
Reviews.Author: julietteb3
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Mercure Tempelhof only for 2 nights but it was really brilliant. Although far from centre you have a tube station about 200 yards away and the tube worked all night so we could come back from clubbing on it as well! The hotel was absolutely stunning, brand new, huge double bed (and my boyfriend is quite tall!) incredible breakfast, and staff are alright. What most facinated us was the bathroom, the bathtube was fabulous! It should be a 5 star except for the area, a normal boring street miles away from everything.

HotelInfo.Name: Mercure Berlin Tempelhof Airport
HotelInfo.Address: Hermannstrasse 214-216 | Eingang Rollbergstrasse, 12049 Berlin, Germany
